content.question: Austerity measures are usually adopted by countries that are seeking to

choices.label: control rapid growth of the economy
reduce dependence on imported fossil fuels
lower budget deficits and publicly held debt
expand social welfare policies that address poverty

content.answer: lower budget deficits and publicly held debt

unit.text: 5: Political and Economic Changes and Development

topic.text: 5.7: Impact of Industrialization and Economic Development

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain political systems, principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
